parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attach a destination to the simple task.<br>Overrides [[setSimpleTaskTarget]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> task '''setSimpleTaskDestination''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> task: [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] - format [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_tskGoHere [[setSimpleTaskDestination]] ([[getMarkerPos]] "obj1");</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Tasks]], [[createSimpleTask]], [[removeSimpleTask]], [[setSimpleTaskDescription]], [[setTaskState]], [[setTaskResult]], [[taskState]], [[taskDestination]], [[cancelSimpleTaskDestination]]
</value></part></template>
